Notes.Text:
This update for xen fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-27379: Fixed an issue where entries in the IOMMU were not being updated 
  under certain circumstances due to improper backport of XSA-321 (XSA-366, bsc#1182431)

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x, allowing x86 Intel HVM guest OS users to achieve unintended read/write DMA access, and possibly cause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain privileges. This occurs because a backport missed a flush, and thus IOMMU updates were not always correct. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-15565.
